uk.ac.ox.cs.diadem.oxpath.model.language.functions

Interface XPathFunction

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    XPathFunctions

    public interface XPathFunction
    Interface for implementing functions in PAAT in the OXPath core engine.
    Author:
    AndrewJSel, Giovanni Grasso

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean checkParameterCount(int numParam)
      Given the number of parameters, can statically check if this function accepts this number of parameters
      OXPathType evaluate(ArrayList<OXPathType> args, PAATStateEvalSet state)
      Evaluates the function (by PAAT with a list of arguments).
      int getMaxParameters()
      Returns the maximum number of parameters this function accepts
      int getMinParameters()
      Returns the minimum number of parameters this function accepts
      String getName()
      Returns the function name (no parentheses)

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        String getName()
        Returns the function name (no parentheses)
        Returns:
        the function name (no parentheses)

      • getMinParameters

        int getMinParameters()
        Returns the minimum number of parameters this function accepts
        Returns:
        the minimum number of parameters this function accepts

      • getMaxParameters

        int getMaxParameters()
        Returns the maximum number of parameters this function accepts
        Returns:
        the maximum number of parameters this function accepts

      • checkParameterCount

        boolean checkParameterCount(int numParam)
        Given the number of parameters, can statically check if this function accepts this number of parameters
        Parameters:
        numParam - num of parameters to check in a function call
        Returns:
        true if the number of parameters are legal; false otherwise

      • evaluate

        OXPathType evaluate(ArrayList<OXPathType> args,
                    PAATStateEvalSet state)
             throws OXPathException
        Evaluates the function (by PAAT with a list of arguments). Number of arguments is not checked. This should be checked beforehand with checkParameterCount(int)
        Parameters:
        args - the list of parameters, computed as a list of OXPathType objects
        state - the state of the evaluation
        Returns:
        the return value of the function as prescribed in the XPath 1.0 standard http://www.w3.org/TR/xpath/
        Throws:
        OXPathException - in case of function error
